page.title: 14Clubs and Organisations.
page.content: The{Girls Brigade}is an {organisation}for girls between 7 and 11 years old. They meet every Thursday at six o'clock in the village hall. They pay ten pence every week and they wear grey skirts, white blouses, burgandy ties and grey jumpers. They have their uniforms checked every week. There is also a{boxing club}held in Sorbie.It has about 20 members who meet on Monday and Wednesday evenings. They pay thirty pence each night and they practise footwork and hand techniques. They have about three fights in one night, and organise matches with other{clubs. There is a Womens Rural in Sorbie. It holds a meeting every second Tuesday in the month.A guest speaker comes and talks obout her/his hobby or occupation.There are about 20 members.
